attributes.additional_details: We are 15 years old and are against the way our British soldiers are treated with lack of praise and compensation after returning from war. We would like to make sure all the soldiers that risk their lives for the sake of ours, get what they desevre by ensuring a good pay out after leaving the armed forces and get the sort of support footballers or famous figures in the media would get for doing nothing important/life endangering for the saftey of our country.
